name: Something Stirs
description:
You've been caught trespassing in monster territory, and now you'll have to pay the price! Find the ingredients to make up their dinner, and maybe you won't end up in it...

Controls:
Click on the blue links to navigate.

Playtime: Around 20 minutes

---

Notice: If you get an error that says "No valid storage adapters found", allowing all cookies should solve the issue.

Originally intended for the Weekly Game Jam 196 with the theme "Strange Recipe" but I finished it late. Oops. Might have one or two bugs, but should be fully playable. There's also no sound.
